pli-tv-pvr1.10:0.2: The monks’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-pvr1.10:0.5: 1. The chapter on offenses entailing expulsion
pli-tv-pvr1.10:1.1: How many kinds of offenses does one commit as a result of having sexual intercourse?
pli-tv-pvr1.10:1.2: One commits four kinds of offenses?
pli-tv-pvr1.10:1.3: when one has sexual intercourse with an undecomposed corpse, one commits an offense entailing expulsion;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:1.4: when one has sexual intercourse with a mostly decomposed corpse, one commits a serious offense;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:1.5: when one inserts the penis without touching into a wide open mouth, one commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-pvr1.10:1.6: when one uses a dildo, one commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-pvr1.10:2.1: How many kinds of offenses does one commit as a result of stealing?
pli-tv-pvr1.10:2.2: One commits three kinds of offenses:
pli-tv-pvr1.10:2.3: when, intending to steal, one steals something worth five māsaka coins or more than five māsakas, one commits an offense entailing expulsion;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:2.4: when, intending to steal, one steals something worth more than one māsaka coin but less than five māsakas, one commits a serious offense;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:2.5: when, intending to steal, one steals something worth one māsaka coin or less than one māsaka, one commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-pvr1.10:3.1: How many kinds of offenses does one commit as a result of intentionally killing a human being?
pli-tv-pvr1.10:3.2: One commits three kinds of offenses:
pli-tv-pvr1.10:3.3: when one digs a pit for people, thinking, “Falling into it someone will die,” one commits an offense of wrong conduct;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:3.4: when the person experiences pain after falling in in, one commits a serious offense;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:3.5: when the person dies, one commits an offense entailing expulsion.
pli-tv-pvr1.10:4.1: How many kinds of offenses does one commit as a result of untruthfully and groundlessly boasting about a superhuman quality?
pli-tv-pvr1.10:4.2: One commits three kinds of offenses:
pli-tv-pvr1.10:4.3: when, having bad desires, overcome by desire, one claims a non-existent, unreal superhuman quality, one commits an offense entailing expulsion;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:4.4: when one says, “Whatever monk lives in your dwelling is a perfected one,” and the listener understands, one commits a serious offense;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:4.5: when the listener does not understand, one commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-pvr1.10:5.1: The four offenses entailing expulsion are finished.
pli-tv-pvr1.10:6.0: 2. The chapter on offenses entailing suspension, etc.
pli-tv-pvr1.10:6.1: How many kinds of offenses does one commit as a result of emitting semen by means of effort?
pli-tv-pvr1.10:6.2: One commits three kinds of offenses:
pli-tv-pvr1.10:6.3: when one intends and makes an effort, and semen is emitted, one commits an offense entailing suspension;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:6.4: when one intends and makes an effort, but semen is not emitted, one commits a serious offense;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:6.5: for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-pvr1.10:7.1: How many kinds of offenses does one commit as a result of making physical contact with a woman?
pli-tv-pvr1.10:7.2: One commits five kinds of offenses:
pli-tv-pvr1.10:7.3: when a lustful nun consents to a lustful man taking hold of her anywhere below the collar bone but above the knees, she commits an offense entailing expulsion;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:7.4: when a monk touches body with body, he commits an offense entailing suspension;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:7.5: when one touches what is connected to the body with the body, one commits a serious offense;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:7.6: when one touches what is connected to the body with what is connected to the body, one commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-pvr1.10:7.7: for tickling, one commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-pvr1.10:8.1: As a result of speaking indecently to a woman, one commits three kinds of offenses:
pli-tv-pvr1.10:8.2: when, referring to the anus or the vagina, one praises and disparages, one commits an offense entailing suspension;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:8.3: when, referring to any part below the collar bone but above the knees, apart from the anus or the vagina, one praises and disparages, one commits a serious offense;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:8.4: when, referring to anything connected to the body, one praises and disparages, one commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-pvr1.10:9.1: As a result of commending the satisfaction of one’s own desires, one commits three kinds of offenses:
pli-tv-pvr1.10:9.2: when one encourages a woman to satisfy one’s own desires, one commits an offense entailing suspension;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:9.3: when one encourages a paṇḍaka to satisfy one’s own desires, one commits a serious offense;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:9.4: when one encourages an animal to satisfy one’s own desires, one commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-pvr1.10:10.1: As a result of acting as a matchmaker, one commits three kinds of offenses:
pli-tv-pvr1.10:10.2: when one accepts the mission, finds out the response, and reports back, one commits an offense entailing suspension;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:10.3: when one accepts the mission, and finds out the response, but does not report back, one commits a serious offense;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:10.4: when one accepts the mission, but neither finds out the response, nor reports back, one commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-pvr1.10:11.1: As a result of having a hut built by means of begging, one commits three kinds of offenses:
pli-tv-pvr1.10:11.2: when one is having it made, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:11.3: when there is one piece left to complete the hut, one commits a serious offense;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:11.4: when the last piece is finished, one commits an offense entailing suspension.
pli-tv-pvr1.10:12.1: As a result of having a large dwelling built, one commits three kinds of offenses:
pli-tv-pvr1.10:12.2: when one is having it made, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:12.3: when there is one piece left to complete the hut, one commits a serious offense;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:12.4: when the last piece is finished, one commits an offense entailing suspension.
pli-tv-pvr1.10:13.1: As a result of groundlessly charging a monk with an offense entailing expulsion, one commits three kinds of offenses:
pli-tv-pvr1.10:13.2: when, without having gotten his permission, one speaks with the aim of making him leave the monastic life, one commits one offense entailing suspension and one offense of wrong conduct;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:13.3: when, having gotten his permission, one speaks with the aim of abusing him, one commits an offense for abusive speech.
pli-tv-pvr1.10:14.1: As a result of charging a monk with an offense entailing expulsion, using an unrelated legal issue as a pretext, one commits three kinds of offenses:
pli-tv-pvr1.10:14.2: when, without having gotten his permission, one speaks with the aim of making him leave the monastic life, one commits one offense entailing suspension and one offense of wrong conduct;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:14.3: when, having gotten his permission, one speaks with the aim of abusing him, one commits an offense for abusive speech.
pli-tv-pvr1.10:15.1: As a result of not stopping when pressed up to three times, a monk who is pursuing schism in the Sangha commits three kinds of offenses:
pli-tv-pvr1.10:15.2: after the motion, he commits an offense of wrong conduct;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:15.3: after each of the first two announcements, he commits a serious offense;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:15.4: when the last announcement is finished, he commits an offense entailing suspension.
pli-tv-pvr1.10:16.1: As a result of not stopping when pressed up to three times, monks who side with a monk who is pursuing schism commit three kinds of offenses:
pli-tv-pvr1.10:16.2: after the motion, he commits an offense of wrong conduct;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:16.3: after each of the first two announcements, he commits a serious offense;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:16.4: when the last announcement is finished, he commits an offense entailing suspension.
pli-tv-pvr1.10:17.1: As a result of not stopping when pressed up to three times, a monk who is difficult to correct commits three kinds of offenses:
pli-tv-pvr1.10:17.2: after the motion, he commits an offense of wrong conduct;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:17.3: after each of the first two announcements, he commits a serious offense;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:17.4: when the last announcement is finished, he commits an offense entailing suspension.
pli-tv-pvr1.10:18.1: As a result of not stopping when pressed up to three times, a monk who is a corrupter of families commits three kinds of offenses:
pli-tv-pvr1.10:18.2: after the motion, he commits an offense of wrong conduct;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:18.3: after each of the first two announcements, he commits a serious offense;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:18.4: when the last announcement is finished, he commits an offense entailing suspension. …
pli-tv-pvr1.10:19.1: As a result of, out of disrespect, defecating, urinating, or spitting in water, how many kinds of offenses does one commit?
pli-tv-pvr1.10:19.2: One commits one kind of offense:
pli-tv-pvr1.10:20.1: The second section “on how many offenses” is finished.
